original_title: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise (Proudly Made in India) (3KG GREEN PAIR)
optimized_title: KAKSS Neoprene-Coated Cast Iron Dumbbells Set, 3kg Pair (2 x 3kg) Green Hex Gym Weights with Non-Slip Grip, Color Coded Hand Weights for Women and Men Home Workout, hexagonal neoprene-coated

image_analysis.product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells Pair Green Hex Dumbbell Weights 3 kg & 3 kg
key_features: Hexagonal Shape Keeps Dumbbells in Place
Thick vinyl coating for comfortable and non-slip feel
Hexagon shaped edges for easy storage and prevent rolling
image_analysis.usage: Used as free weights for gym and home exercise, strength training, and fitness workouts.
image_analysis.target_audience: People performing gym or home workouts who want 3 kg dumbbells for strength and fitness training.
image_analysis.ai_description: A pair of compact green hex dumbbells with a smooth neoprene coating and white “KAKSS 3 KG” markings on the ends. The hexagonal heads prevent rolling, and the slightly textured surface offers a non-slip grip. Shown in clean, minimal lifestyle and infographic layouts.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Neoprene-coated cast iron core stays solid and balanced for years of daily workouts.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Cheap sand- or cement-filled dumbbells crack, leak, or feel uneven after light use.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Thick neoprene grip gives a secure, non-slip hold even with sweaty hands.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Glossy plastic or metal handles get slippery and uncomfortable, forcing you to stop sets.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Hexagonal heads prevent rolling, keeping your floor and toes safe between sets.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Round dumbbells roll away, causing trip hazards and scuffs on floors and furniture.

comparison_points.our_benefit: Color-coded 3 kg pair with clear end markings makes weight selection fast and easy.
comparison_points.competitor_issue: Unmarked or faded weights make it hard to find the right pair and slow down workouts.
